Package anydev

Class AnyDevException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.RuntimeException
anydev.AnyDevException
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAnyDevException, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AgentCommunicationException, DataIntegrityException, EnumMissingException, GeneralModelException, InvalidArgumentException, SanityCheckFailedException
public abstract class AnyDevException extends RuntimeException implements IAnyDevException
Base custom exception Extending RuntimeException makes it an unchecked exception (i.e. no enforcement of try-catch or "throws") This class also carries an associated Logger instance for rich error details.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • AnyDevException

      protected AnyDevException(String errorCode, Logger associatedLogger)
      Constructs a BaseApplicationException with a specific error code. The message for the exception is derived from the associated Logger's description.
      Parameters:
      errorCode - The unique code identifying this error type.
      associatedLogger - The Logger instance providing details about this error.

    • AnyDevException

      protected AnyDevException(String errorCode, String message, Logger associatedLogger)
      Constructs a BaseApplicationException with a specific error code and a custom message. Useful when the exception message should be more specific than the Logger's cause description.
      Parameters:
      errorCode - The unique code identifying this error type.
      message - A custom message for the exception.
      associatedLogger - The Logger instance providing details about this error.

    • AnyDevException

      protected AnyDevException(String errorCode, String message, Throwable cause, Logger associatedLogger)
      Constructs a BaseApplicationException with a specific error code, custom message, and a cause.
      Parameters:
      errorCode - The unique code identifying this error type.
      message - A custom message for the exception.
      cause - The underlying cause of this exception.
      associatedLogger - The Logger instance providing details about this error.
